casebody.data:
No. 10-5557. Victor Perkins, Petitioner v. James Conway, Superintendent, Attica Correctional Facility. 562 U.S. 954, 131 S. Ct. 318,

178 L. Ed. 2d 253,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7701. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

*254Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 596 F.3d 161.
